name: LocationCoordinates
summary: Simple object holding the data for a location update.

properties.name: accuracy
properties.summary: Accuracy of the location update, in meters.

properties.name: altitude
properties.summary: Altitude of the location update, in meters.

properties.name: altitudeAccuracy
properties.summary: Vertical accuracy of the location update, in meters.

properties.name: floor
properties.summary: The floor of the building on which the user is located.

properties.name: heading
properties.summary: Compass heading, in degrees. May be unknown if device is not moving. On iOS, a negative value indicates that the heading data is not valid.

properties.name: latitude
properties.summary: Latitude of the location update, in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitude
properties.summary: Longitude of the location update, in decimal degrees.

properties.name: speed
properties.summary: Current speed in meters/second. On iOS, a negative value indicates that the heading data is not valid or the accuracy is configured incorrectly. Note: Due to the Apple Geolocation API, set the accuracy property to ACCURACY_BEST_FOR_NAVIGATION in order to properly measure speed changes and prevent the app from returning negative values.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.summary: Timestamp for this location update, in milliseconds.
